price: Yoo isaan dhoowwaman (waraana dhaabanii amantii seenan) Rabbiin akkaan mararfataa rahmata godhaadha.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
